ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:56:11 [Issue ID 4000-220563] urn:comicvine:4000-220563 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 03:01:47. [Issue ID 381782]
ComicInfo.Summary: When his creator grew up, Superhero G was forgotten and sent to the Imagined Nation. Now, donning the secret identity of George, Superhero G as found himself playing the role of superhero: righting wrongs and helping the people of the city, who are oppressed by the Ice Queen's dictatorial regime. But as Superhero G's first day in the Imagined Nation come to a close, he finds himself resolved even more to find a way to reunite with his creator. Because as night comes to the city, Superhero G finds himself facing something he has never had to face before: being alone.
ComicInfo.Title: Lost and Found, Part 3 (of 4)
